items.title: BlackRock, Goldman Scale Up Tax Trades in $3 Trillion SMA Boom
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- This year’s stock market turbulence has punished ordinary investors. But for the wealthy, it’s opened up fresh opportunities to convert equity swings into tax breaks — fueling a growing Wall Street business that turns volatility into a financial advantage.
